answers.answer: You may just have a lot of amniotic fluid is my guess. Did your measurement just randomly go up?
Yes all the way along I've been measuring exactly spot on, and then today it just jumped up , I hope it is amniotic fluid of something quite simple like that as it's made me quite nervous now .

question: Hi there,I was at my midwife appointment this morning, when she measured my fundal height instead of measuring 28weeks, my little jellybean is measuring 32 weeks, my gestial diabetes test was only done last week and it's came back all clear so she is confused as to why my baby is soo big.....I've got to go for a scan next Tuesday and see a consultant...has this happened to Any other ladies, I'm a first time mum so I think I'm probably worrying more than I should be.
title: ftm measuring 4weeks ahead ?
